column1: Mubarakpur is a town and a municipal board in Azamgarh district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. It is located at a distance of 13 km north-east of the district headquarters in Azamgarh.
Mubarakpur is located at 26.09°N 83.29°E﻿ / 26.09; 83.29. It has an average elevation of 69 metres (226 feet).
The total population of Mubarakpur is 70
column2: 463 as of 2011 census. Males constitute 51.3% of the population whereas females 48.7%.

column1: Mubarakpur is notable for the manufacture of sarees
The Temple of Thakurji and Mosque of Raja Sahib are well known places of worship.
